directions: In a bowl stir together olives, tomato, shallot, basil julienne,capers, zest, lemon juice, and 1 tablespoon oil to make salsa and season with freshly ground black pepper and salt.

Season cod with salt. In a non-stick skillet heat remaining tablespoon oil over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking and cook cod about 4 minutes on each side, or until golden and cooked through.
Spoon salsa over cod and garnish with basil sprigs.
ingredients: 1/3 cup Kalamata or other brine-cured black olives, pitted and diced
title: Cod with Mediterranean Salsa
